EmailTemplate.subject: Work Smarter, Not Harder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> A More Efficient 9-5 <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Boost your office efficiency with the products you need to get the work done. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Headsets-Headphones/_/N-8b7?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Headphones With many offices opting for ‘open-plan’, these offer an easy solution to block out distractions, and stay on-task. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Headsets-Headphones/_/N-8b7?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Glass-Dry-Erase-Boards/_/N-ag7?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Dry Erase Board Versatile, interactive and creative, a white board is a cost-effective way to keep organized. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Glass-Dry-Erase-Boards/_/N-ag7?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Sit-Stand-Workstations/_/N-b7b?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Standing Desk Mix sitting with standing and you’ll see big improvements to your physical and mental health. Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Sit-Stand-Workstations/_/N-b7b?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Save on headphones, dry erase boards, standing desks, and more today! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Sign In To Save <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBBSFIRSTJOURNEY&utm_source=Marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GZ+Explicit+04&utm_content=BS+Nurture+04]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
